ygData.subject: Re: Another suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay I can understand that fear, because I have hunted with three other shadow knights  In any case, a faster recharge rate or slightly higher
ygData.messageBody:
Okay I can understand that fear, because I have hunted with three other
shadow knights <evil grin> In any case, a faster recharge rate or slightly
higher damage as we reach the higher levels would be good because after a
certain point the amount of damage done by HT is piddling compared to the Hit
Points some of these monsters, so being able to do it more ofter or hurt just
a bit more would be nice.

In a message dated 9/17/99 3:28:31 PM Eastern Daylight Time, bhook@...
writes:

<< I know HT comes up a lot, but there is a fear that HT could end up being
heavily abused (worst nightmare....party of 6 50th level SKs stand around
Mr. Named Mob that only pops once a day anyway, BAM 3000HP gone instantly
and you now have a mob that starts the fight at 1/2 HP).

If HT was upped slightly, had a slightly higher recharge rate, etc...what
are your suggestions?

Brian >>
